task.summary: Basic functionality working w/ no UI
Finally got proper behavior for learning, enabling. Disable tracking of basestation id on CDMA/lte
More icons, fixed towers disabling, fixed airplane mde
new UI w/ notification, new engine
Fix npe in blacklist gui, link notification
Add learning screen, change some verbage, try to minimize notification updates
Revamp UI creation to push binder to each fragment for simplified fragment use, update learned fragment to update tower lists
Undo service binding code which doesn't work right, fixed tower map code updating
Maybe fix upgrade problem w/ database, move UI to viewpager with sliding support, raise minimum api to 13
Fix problem with tower id calculation, add tethering detection
Minor re-order and comments on blacklist application order, fix tabs losing position on rotate/resume
